verses.verse: And this <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> that you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them to hallow <S%H6942><s%> them, to minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office: Take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish, <S%H8549><s%>

And unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and cakes <S%H2471><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> tempered <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and wafers <S%H7550><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil: <S%H8081><s%> of wheaten <S%H2406><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> them.

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> them into <S%H5921><s%> one <S%H259><s%> basket, <S%H5536><s%> and bring <S%H7126><s%> them in the basket, <S%H5536><s%> with the bullock <S%H6499><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams. <S%H352><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and shall wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the garments, <S%H899><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> the coat, <S%H3801><s%> and the robe <S%H4598><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the ephod, <S%H646><s%> and the breastplate, <S%H2833><s%> and gird <S%H640><s%> him with the curious girdle <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod: <S%H646><s%>
And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown <S%H5145><s%> on the turban. <S%H4701><s%>
Then shall you take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and pour <S%H3332><s%> it on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> him.
And you shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> coats <S%H3801><s%> on them.

And you shall gird <S%H2296><s%> them with girdles, <S%H73><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H2280><s%> the bonnets <S%H4021><s%> on them: and the priest's <S%H3550><s%> office shall be theirs <S%H1992><s%> for a perpetual <S%H5769><s%> statute: <S%H2708><s%> and you shall consecrate <S%H3027><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons. <S%H1121><s%>

And you shall cause a bullock <S%H6499><s%> to be brought <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bullock. <S%H6499><s%>
And you shall kill <S%H7819><s%> the bullock <S%H6499><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> with your finger, <S%H676><s%> and pour <S%H8210><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> beside <S%H413><s%> the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> that is above <S%H5921><s%> the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, and burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and his skin, <S%H5785><s%> and his dung, <S%H6569><s%> shall you burn <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%> it is a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering.

You shall also take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram; <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>
And you shall slay <S%H7819><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and you shall take <S%H3947><s%> his blood, <S%H1818><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it round <S%H5439><s%> about on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And you shall cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> in pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and wash <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> of him, and his legs, <S%H3767><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them to his pieces, <S%H5409><s%> and to his head. <S%H7218><s%>

And you shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the whole <S%H854><s%> <S%H3605><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%> it is a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the other <S%H8145><s%> ram; <S%H352><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall put <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

Then shall you kill <S%H7819><s%> the ram, <S%H352><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> of his blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right ear <S%H241><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and on the tip <S%H8571><s%> of the right <S%H3233><s%> ear <S%H241><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the great toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot, <S%H7272><s%> and sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about.

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> that is on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and sprinkle <S%H5137><s%> it on Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and on his garments, <S%H899><s%> and on his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him: and he shall be hallowed, <S%H6942><s%> and his garments, <S%H899><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> with him.

Also you shall take <S%H3947><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> and the rump, <S%H451><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covers <S%H3680><s%> the inwards, <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> above the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, and the right <S%H3233><s%> shoulder; <S%H7785><s%> for it is a ram <S%H352><s%> of consecration: <S%H4394><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> loaf <S%H3603><s%> of bread, <S%H3899><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of oiled <S%H8081><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> wafer <S%H7550><s%> out of the basket <S%H5536><s%> of the unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread that is before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall put <S%H7760><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and in the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons; <S%H1121><s%> and shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall receive <S%H3947><s%> them of their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and burn <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of Aaron's <S%H175><s%> consecration, <S%H4394><s%> and wave <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and it shall be your part. <S%H4490><s%>

And you shall sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> of the wave <S%H8573><s%> offering, and the shoulder <S%H7785><s%> of the heave <S%H8641><s%> offering, <S%H8641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is waved, <S%H5130><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> is heaved <S%H7311><s%> up, of the ram <S%H352><s%> of the consecration, <S%H4394><s%> even of that which <S%H834><s%> is for Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and of that which <S%H834><s%> is for his sons: <S%H1121><s%>

And it shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> for it is an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering: <S%H8641><s%> and it shall be an heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of their peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, even their heave <S%H8641><s%> offering <S%H8641><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be his sons' <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, to be anointed <S%H4888><s%> therein, and to be consecrated <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> in them.

And that son <S%H1121><s%> that is priest <S%H3548><s%> in his stead <S%H8478><s%> shall put <S%H3847><s%> them on seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H834><s%> he comes <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> to minister <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place.
And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the consecration, <S%H4394><s%> and seethe <S%H1310><s%> his flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the ram, <S%H352><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%> that is in the basket <S%H5536><s%>by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And they shall eat <S%H398><s%> those things with which <S%H834><s%> the atonement <S%H3722><s%> was made, to consecrate <S%H3027><s%> and to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> them: but a stranger <S%H2114><s%> shall not eat <S%H398><s%> thereof, because <S%H3588><s%> they are holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> ought of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the consecrations, <S%H4394><s%> or of the bread, <S%H3899><s%> remain <S%H3498><s%> to the morning, <S%H1242><s%> then you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> the remainder <S%H3498><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> it shall not be eaten, <S%H398><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> it is holy. <S%H6944><s%>

And thus shall you do <S%H6213><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> things which <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you: seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall you consecrate <S%H3027><s%> them.

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering for atonement: <S%H3725><s%> and you shall cleanse <S%H2398><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> when you have made an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it, and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> it, to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it; and it shall be an altar <S%H4196><s%> most <S%H6944><s%> holy: <S%H6944><s%> whatever <S%H3605><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> is that which <S%H834><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%> continually. <S%H8548><s%>

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even: <S%H6153><s%>

And with the one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> a tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7253><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil; <S%H8081><s%> and the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> for a drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> and shall do <S%H6213><s%> thereto according to the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and according to the drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereof, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

This shall be a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> you, to speak <S%H1696><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to you.
And there <S%H8033><s%> I will meet <S%H3259><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the tabernacle shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> by my glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and the altar: <S%H4196><s%> I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> also both Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister to me in the priest's <S%H3547><s%> office.
And I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and will be their God. <S%H430><s%>

And they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> that brought <S%H3318><s%> them forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that I may dwell <S%H7931><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them: I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>
